alert.note: Alert for Morton; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL MORTON AND SOUTH CENTRAL OLIVER COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Center, or 23 miles southwest of Washburn, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sweet Briar Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Brief but very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
